sentences.en: A new Catholic bishop was installed in Galway yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天在戈尔韦任命了一位新的天主教主教。

sentences.en: At least nine out of ten Mexicans are baptized Catholics.
sentences.cn: 至少十分之九的墨西哥人是受过洗礼的天主教徒。

sentences.en: Bresson is par excellence the Catholic film-maker.
sentences.cn: 布雷森是个非常出色的天主教电影制作人。

sentences.en: Devlin was reconciled with the Catholic Church in his last few days.
sentences.cn: 德夫林在生命的最后几天与天主教会达成和解。

sentences.en: He had been ordained as a deacon in the Roman Catholic Church.
sentences.cn: 他被任命为天主教的助祭。

sentences.en: He had trained to be a Catholic priest.
sentences.cn: 他受训成为了一名天主教神父。

sentences.en: He was a recent Catholic convert, and very zealous.
sentences.cn: 他最近才皈依天主教，是一名狂热的信徒。

sentences.en: He was ordained a Catholic priest in 1982.
sentences.cn: 他于1982年被任命为天主教司铎。

sentences.en: Her strong Catholic beliefs made abortion unthinkable.
sentences.cn: 笃信天主教让她完全无法接受堕胎。

sentences.en: I think your mother was baptized a Catholic.
sentences.cn: 我想你母亲受洗成了天主教徒。

sentences.en: It presented in satirical terms points made in earnest by Catholic writers.
sentences.cn: 它用讽刺的语言呈现了天主教作家郑重其事表明的观点。

sentences.en: Like her, Maria was a Roman Catholic.
sentences.cn: 和她一样，玛丽亚也是天主教徒。

sentences.en: Mr Thomas was taught by the Catholic nuns whose school he attended.
sentences.cn: 托马斯先生是在天主教修女创办的学校接受的教育。

sentences.en: She calls herself a lapsed Catholic.
sentences.cn: 她称自己已不再信仰天主教。

sentences.en: The Catholic Church has played a prominent role throughout Polish history.
sentences.cn: 天主教会在整个波兰历史上曾发挥过举足轻重的作用。

sentences.en: The marriage signalled James's embrace of the Catholic faith.
sentences.cn: 这桩婚姻标志着詹姆斯皈依了天主教.

phrases.tran_cn: 天主教；天主教会；天主教堂；大公教会
罗马天主教的；天主教会的；天主教徒
罗马天主教会；罗马公教

trans.tran_en: connected with the Roman Catholic Church
a member of the Catholic Church
